Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] Theory and Algorithms of Machine Learning for Communication

Messages.Author: Slawomir Stanczak
Messages.Content: Dear students,  We would like to inform you that the lecture on June 10, 2024 for the lecture: "Theory and Algorithms of Machine Learning for Communication" will take place online. The lecture will take place at the usual time (12:00 to 14:00 (c.t.) ). Messages.Author: Kerstin Reinhardt
Messages.Content: Next Lecture: [SoSe 2024] Theory and Algorithms of Machine Learning for Communication (May, 6th)   Dear students,  unfortunately, the next lecture (May, 6) will have to be cancelled.  Thank you for your understanding.  Best regards NetIT secretary office
